testcase.name: Create a new user
testcase.system-out: Given I have new user data with username "kietakaktis", email "tavo@kakta", and password "VenaIsKaktos".passed When I send a POST request to "/users" to create the user...................passed Then the response status should be 201......................................passed And the response should contain username "kietakaktis"......................passed And the response should contain email "tavo@kakta"..........................passed

testcase.name: Get all users list
testcase.system-out: Given there are two users in the system.....................................passed When I send a GET request to "/users".......................................passed Then the response status should be a 200....................................passed And the response should contain user with username "tomas" of user list.....passed And the response should contain user with email "tomas@nesakysiu" of user list.passed And the response should contain user with username "lukas" of user list.....passed And the response should contain user with email "lukas@nesakysiu" of user list.passed

testcase.name: Delete a user by ID
testcase.system-out: Given a user with ID 9 exists...............................................passed When I send a DELETE request to "/users/9"..................................passed Then the response status of delete request should be 204....................passed

testcase.name: Update a user by ID
testcase.system-out: Given a user with ID value of 9 exists......................................passed And I have updated user data with username "homer", email "homer@simpson.com", and password "lovesbeer".passed When I send a PUT request to "/users/9" to update the user..................passed Then the response status of update request should be 200....................passed And the response should contain updated user with username "homer"..........passed And the response should contain updated user with email "homer@simpson.com".passed
